generatedPrompts.frontCover:
Flat 2D illustration for a greeting card. A whimsical and humorous dreamscape celebrating a birthday. The style is soft, ethereal fantasy art with a pastel color palette and magical glowing elements.

In the center, an illustrated cartoon version of Jordan from the reference photo is hilariously trying to balance all his favorite activities at once. He's wearing athletic gym shorts and a tank top. On his feet, he has one running shoe (for racing) and one snowboard boot. He's standing on a snowboard that is comically balanced atop a giant, magical, floating sushi roll. In one hand, he's lifting a comically large dumbbell shaped like a piece of salmon nigiri. In his other hand, he's holding a laptop with glowing code on the screen, representing work. He has a determined yet slightly overwhelmed and funny expression on his face.

An illustrated cartoon version of Lao Lao from the reference photo stands beside him, looking on with an amused and loving smile. She's holding out a beautifully decorated birthday cake with glowing candles towards him, adding to the celebratory chaos. She is wearing the yellow floral dress from the photo.

The background is a dreamy, magical landscape. The "ground" is a fluffy, pastel cloud bank. In the sky, a whimsical race track made of shimmering light loops and swirls. Floating around the couple are various chibi-style elements: cute pieces of sushi (tuna, shrimp, avocado rolls) with tiny wings, floating dumbbells, and glowing computer icons. The overall composition is dynamic, funny, and fantastical, creating a lighthearted "day in the life" scene.

In the center of the image, placed on the cloud bank beneath the couple, is the text "Happy Birthday Jordan" written in a beautiful, readable, elegant cursive script with a soft, magical glow. The text is positioned safely away from the top and bottom edges.
generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimal and elegant flat 2D illustration for a greeting card back cover. The style is soft, ethereal fantasy art with a dreamy pastel color palette and magical glowing elements. The background is a simple, serene expanse of fluffy, pastel-colored clouds. In the upper-left corner, a single, small, whimsical element: a tiny floating cloud with a soft, magical glow, from which a delicate wisp of shimmering light trails off towards the top edge. The overall visual density is very low, about 20% decoration, creating a clean and branded look. The bottom-right quadrant is completely empty to leave space for a logo or QR code. Full-bleed background.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A decorative flat 2D illustration for the left interior panel of a greeting card, designed to be visually rich yet unobtrusive. The style is dreamy fantasy anime, with a soft pastel color palette and a magical atmosphere. The entire panel is a full-bleed background depicting a whimsical, enchanted sky filled with soft, fluffy clouds. A beautiful, shimmering race track made of faint, glowing light arcs gracefully from the top-left corner down towards the bottom-right, disappearing behind the clouds. Floating gently in the sky are a few small, glowing orbs of light and tiny, sparkling motes. There are no characters or text. The composition has a 40% visual density, creating a beautiful, complementary scene without overwhelming the card's interior.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
A minimal flat 2D illustration for the right interior panel of a greeting card, designed to frame a written message. The style is soft, ethereal fantasy art with a dreamy pastel color palette. The background is a very light, almost white, pastel cloudscape, creating a bright and open space. The decoration is minimal, confined to the corners to maximize writing area. In the top-left and bottom-right corners, there are small, delicate clusters of tiny, glowing fairy-tale sparkles and soft, swirling wisps of magical light. The decorative elements occupy no more than 20% of the total area, ensuring the center is clear and elegant for a personalized message. Full-bleed background.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "Hey Jordan,

Happy Birthday! I was going to get you a really amazing gift, but then I figured my stunning good looks and long legs were the best present you could ask for. You’re welcome! I hope your day is as wonderful as you are (and almost as wonderful as I am).

All my love,
Lao Lao"
